Diagnosis__c: Treatment failure or intolerance to at least one other sulfonylurea drug (e.g., glyburide, tolbutamide) at adequate doses.
Connective tissue disease (e.g., lupus, scleroderma, crest)
Eradication of helicobacter pylori, as part of triple therapy (maximum 14 day approval)
